import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AiFillStar, AiFillProfile, AiFillHeart , AiOutlineProfile, AiOutlineHeart} from "react-icons/ai"; const ModalCard = ({ data, setActive }) => { return (

{data.name ? `${data.name} (${data.original_name})` : `${data.title} (${data.original_title})`}

{data.tagline}

{ button ? : } { button2 ? : }

Estreno: {data.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(data.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

Votos de la gente: {data.vote_average}%

{data.overview}

setActive("")}>Leer mas...
) } export default ModalCard
